long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop overpaying now! AliExpress Image Search allows you to search for products on AliExpress with a product image. Discover and buy products directly from AliExpress, cutting out middlemen markups.

How does it work?
As an online shopper, you can easily discover products on our site by right-clicking on an image.

Our smart tech uses fancy tricks like image recognition to figure out what's in the picture. Once recognized, it gives you links to the same products on AliExpress, making it a breeze to explore and buy what you want in just a few steps.

This feature amps up your shopping experience by letting you visually find and locate products, making it super easy to get what you're looking for.
